SmsTroubleshootingTips.title: If the verification SMS does not arrive, please verify the following:
SmsTroubleshootingTips.tip1: The phone number entered is accurate.
SmsTroubleshootingTips.tip2: Your device has sufficient network coverage and is not in airplane mode.
SmsTroubleshootingTips.tip3: SMS filtering, blocking settings, or carrier restrictions are not preventing delivery.
SmsTroubleshootingTips.tip4: The message has not been placed in your spam or junk folder.

CompleteTicketDialog.selectActions: Select the actions you have completed
CompleteTicketDialog.evidencePlaceholder: Evidence that you have completed the action, such as a report URL, event logs, file hashes, etc.
